paper_abstract: Recently, among MIMO-OFDM detection schemes, a lot of V-BLAST schemes have been suggested in order to achieve high data rate. Therefore signal detection of MIMO-OFDM system is important issue. In this letter, extended DFE detection scheme is proposed. According to simulation result, the extended DFE detection has similar performance with QRD-M detection but the complexity is about 24.02% of QRD-M detection. Therefore the proposed E-DFE detection can be efficiently used in MIMO-OFDM system.
paper_title: Extended DFE Detection Scheme in MIMO-OFDM System
